instructions: Tap the app switcher button (square) in the bottom right corner of the screen. Find the app you want to place at the top of your screen, and tap and drag the app to the top of the screen. Find the app you want to place at the bottom of your screen, and tap to place it beneath the first app.

With the app open, tap and hold the app switcher button. This will place the app in the top position of your screen. Find the app you want to place at the bottom of the screen, and tap to place it beneath the first app.

The first and easiest way is to just tap and hold the app switcher button (which now is made up of two rectangles) until the top app once again takes up the entire screen. The second way is to tap and drag on the black line separating the apps. Just drag that line to the bottom of the screen.
